synopsis.text: Azuma, Taichirou, and their estranged parents find solace in the virtual world of 'Planet,' where they form an unstoppable team known as the Akabane Family. Unbeknownst to them, their online family is a mirror of their broken real-life family. As they navigate through epic battles against monsters, rival guilds, and the mysterious final objective 'Black Bird,' they begin to uncover the truth about their real-world identities. Will they be able to mend their fractured relationships and find the warmth of family they've been missing? Only time will tell as their online and offline worlds collide in this gripping tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
